content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Systems is a company where every employee can realize his/her potential from a professional and career perspective. Stay up to date with the latest news in the sphere of corporate learning — make use of the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://epmsp002/Training/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Training Portal \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"capacities.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"By the way, you can find out about position ranking\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://ephubudvsd0087.budapest.epam.com/pal/pal_method_plugin/guidances/whitepapers/doc_WIHR_PositionRanking_401F8FD8.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"here\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"(via PAL).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you have any questions about this section, you may direct them to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFAHR@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFAHumanResource\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFACareerDevelopment@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFACareerDevelopment\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", and/or your manager or mentor.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
